text.0: with songs of praise we call on thee we kindle thee with songs of praise.
text.1: agni with songs of praise for help.
text.2: eager for wealth we meditate agnis effectual praise today.
text.3: praise of the god who touches heaven.
text.4: may agni priest among mankind take pleasure in our songs of praise.
text.6: thou agni art spread widely forth priest dear and excellent through thee.
text.8: singers exalt thee agni well lauded best giver of our strength.
text.9: so grant thou us heroic might.
text.10: thou agni as the felly rings the spokes encompassest the gods.
